articles.title: Sensex, Nifty inch lower as financials weigh, TCS results in focus

articles.title: What is funnel chest and how is it treated?
articles.description: Funnel chest is when there is a cup like deformity usually located in the lower part of the chest. It is known as ‘Pectus excavatum’ and is also commonly referred to as ‘Sunken Chest’. It is much more common in boys than girls and often becomes more apparent …
